add.title: MVV Issue Form
add.description: Form to collect the Provisional Residence Permit (MVV) at the embassy.

add.title: Antecedents Certificate
add.description: Declaration that you have no criminal record.

steps_flow.title: University Applies for MVV
steps_flow.description: The university submits the application for your entry visa (MVV) and residence permit (VVR) to the IND.

steps_flow.title: IND Approval
steps_flow.description: The Immigration and Naturalisation Service (IND) approves the application.

steps_flow.title: Book Appointment
steps_flow.description: Book an appointment at the Dutch Embassy/Consulate to collect the MVV.

steps_flow.title: Collect MVV
steps_flow.description: Submit passport and biometrics. The MVV sticker is placed in your passport.

application_platforms.name: University Portals
application_platforms.description: Applications are submitted directly to each university's online portal.

pre_visa_steps.title: Register on Studielink
pre_visa_steps.description: Create account and select your course.

pre_visa_steps.title: Submit University Application
pre_visa_steps.description: Upload documents to the university portal.

pre_visa_steps.title: Pay Tuition & Visa Fee
pre_visa_steps.description: Transfer the tuition fee and visa fee to the university.

pre_visa_steps.title: University Starts TEV
pre_visa_steps.description: The university applies for your visa on your behalf.
